product_name: The North Face  Camp Hike Convertible Pants - Girls'
long_description: The North Face Camp Hike Convertible Pants clothe girls in durable, sun-protective stretch nylon fabric and zip-off legs that quickly morph them into shorts, perfect for family hikes and days at camp.
short_description: The North Face Camp Hike Convertible Pants clothe girls in durable, sun-protective stretch nylon fabric and zip-off legs that quickly morph them into shorts, perfect for family hikes and days at camp.
